languages.text: При вашем приближении "Алый преследователь" шлет радушное приветствие. Капитан Демир Шахни желает здравия вам и всей вашей династии и интересуется, не обзавелись ли вы свежей информацией о пылающих мирах.

traits.locale_text: При вашем приближении "Алый преследователь" шлет радушное приветствие. Капитан Демир Шахни желает здравия вам и всей вашей династии и интересуется, не обзавелись ли вы свежей информацией о пылающих мирах.

languages.text: Upon your approach, the Scarlet Pursuer sends out a hearty greeting. Captain Demir Shahnee wishes good health upon you and your entire dynasty, and asks if you might have any up-to-date information on burning worlds.
languages.original_text: При вашем приближении "Алый преследователь" шлет радушное приветствие. Капитан Демир Шахни желает здравия вам и всей вашей династии и интересуется, не обзавелись ли вы свежей информацией о пылающих мирах.

traits.locale_text: Upon your approach, the Scarlet Pursuer sends out a hearty greeting. Captain Demir Shahnee wishes good health upon you and your entire dynasty, and asks if you might have any up-to-date information on fireworlds.

Upon your approach, the Scarlet Pursuer sends out a hearty greeting. Captain Demir Shahnee wishes good health upon you and your entire dynasty, and asks if you might have any up-to-date information on fireworlds.

Upon your approach, the Scarlet Pursuer sends out a hearty greeting. Captain Demir Shahnee wishes good health upon you and your entire dynasty, and asks if you might have any up-to-date information on burning worlds.

Upon your approach, the Scarlet Pursuer sends out a hearty greeting. Captain Demir Shahnee wishes good health upon you and your entire dynasty, and asks if you might have any up-to-date information on burning worlds.

Upon your approach, the Scarlet Pursuer sends out a hearty greeting. Captain Demir Shahnee wishes good health upon you and your entire dynasty, and asks if you might have any up-to-date information on burning worlds.

languages.text: 当你的飞船靠近时，猩红追击者号对你致以热烈的问候。德米尔·绍恩舰长祝你和你的整个王朝万事如意，并询问你是否了解关于燃烧世界的最新情报。
languages.original_text: Upon your approach, the Scarlet Pursuer sends out a hearty greeting. Captain Demir Shahnee wishes good health upon you and your entire dynasty, and asks if you might have any up-to-date information on burning worlds.

traits.locale_text: 当你的飞船靠近时，猩红追击者号对你致以热烈的问候。德米尔·绍恩舰长祝你和你的整个王朝万事如意，并询问你是否了解关于燃烧群界的最新情报。

languages.text: Al acercarte, la Persecutora Escarlata envía un cordial saludo. El capitán Demir Shahnee os desea buena suerte a ti y a toda tu dinastía y pregunta si tienes información reciente sobre mundos ardientes.
languages.original_text: Upon your approach, the Scarlet Pursuer sends out a hearty greeting. Captain Demir Shahnee wishes good health upon you and your entire dynasty, and asks if you might have any up-to-date information on burning worlds.

traits.locale_text: Al acercarte, la Persecutora Escarlata envía un cordial saludo. El capitán Demir Shahnee os desea buena suerte a ti y a toda tu dinastía y pregunta si tienes información reciente sobre mundos ardientes.

languages.text: 近づいていくと、スカーレット・パースア号は心からの出迎えをしてくれた。デミール・シャーニー船長は王朝の健勝を祈るとともに、バーニングワールドに関する最新の情報を知りたがっている。
languages.original_text: Upon your approach, the Scarlet Pursuer sends out a hearty greeting. Captain Demir Shahnee wishes good health upon you and your entire dynasty, and asks if you might have any up-to-date information on burning worlds.

traits.locale_text: 近づいていくと、スカーレット・パースア号は心からの出迎えをしてくれた。デミール・シャーニー船長は王朝の健勝を祈るとともに、バーニングワールドに関する最新の情報を知りたがっている。

languages.text: Als du dich näherst, schickt die Scharlachroter Verfolger einen herzlichen Gruß. Captain Demir Shahnee wünscht dir und deiner gesamten Dynastie beste Gesundheit und fragt, ob du möglicherweise aktuelle Informationen zu brennenden Welten hast.
languages.original_text: Upon your approach, the Scarlet Pursuer sends out a hearty greeting. Captain Demir Shahnee wishes good health upon you and your entire dynasty, and asks if you might have any up-to-date information on burning worlds.

traits.locale_text: Als du dich näherst, schickt die Scharlachroter Verfolger einen herzlichen Gruß. Captain Demir Shahnee wünscht dir und deiner gesamten Dynastie beste Gesundheit und fragt, ob du möglicherweise aktuelle Informationen zu brennenden Welten hast.

languages.text: À votre approche, le Traqueur écarlate vous salue chaleureusement. Le capitaine Demir Shahnee vous souhaite une bonne santé, ainsi qu'à votre dynastie tout entière, et vous demande si vous avez des informations récentes sur les mondes ardents.
languages.original_text: Upon your approach, the Scarlet Pursuer sends out a hearty greeting. Captain Demir Shahnee wishes good health upon you and your entire dynasty, and asks if you might have any up-to-date information on burning worlds.

traits.locale_text: À votre approche, le Traqueur écarlate vous salue chaleureusement. Le capitaine Demir Shahnee vous souhaite une bonne santé, ainsi qu'à votre dynastie tout entière, et vous demande si vous avez des informations récentes sur les mondes ardents.

languages.text: Lal Takipçi'ye yaklaştığında sıcak bir karşılama mesajı alıyorsun. Kaptan Demir Shahnee, sana ve tüm hanedanına sağlık dileklerinde bulunuyor ve yanan dünyalara dair güncel bilgilerin olup olmadığını soruyor.
languages.original_text: Upon your approach, the Scarlet Pursuer sends out a hearty greeting. Captain Demir Shahnee wishes good health upon you and your entire dynasty, and asks if you might have any up-to-date information on burning worlds.
